name: Kira's Flower Delivery
description:
The people of the city are falling deeper and deeper into depression. Kira is the only florist powerful enough to save them

Instructions: 

(It's a rhythm game)

To throw flowers to the left press F to throw to the right press J

Copy the rhythm of the people in the windows. 

"Hey" -> 1 press

"Oi Kid" -> 2 press

"I hate you!" -> 3 press
